name: Gemini 2.0 Flash Live (001)
description: Real-time streaming model with 1M token context for low-latency voice and video interactions via Live API. Supports continuous audio/video streams with immediate responses. DEPRECATED December 9, 2025.
notes: DEPRECATED - Will be removed December 9, 2025. Use gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio-preview instead. Live API with 25 tokens/sec audio, 258 tokens/sec video. Audio input $3.00/1M, audio output $12.00/1M tokens. Supports native image generation and multimodal Live API.
